entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve the first-run experience for workloads - detect common version mismatch scenarios and tell the user the actions to perform to resolve them #31872
  • I get error NU1202 when I try to build the SDK on my local machine #31856
  • Unable to load shared library 'hostfxr' or one of its dependencies on Alpine inside Docker #31848

Closed

  • dotnet tool restore interactive doesn't prompt for DeviceFlow since .NET 6 SDK #22987
  • Self-contained app with Trim unused code selected trims used code #31832
  • Certificate expired - Microsoft package registry #31862
  • NETSDK1085 invoking `dotnet publish --no-restore --no-build` on multi-project build using dirs.proj #18206
  • GenAPI drops internal ctor #31776
  • GenAPI generates invalid '$' token in method name #31657
  • `dotnet tool update --install <tool>` #31824

PullRequests

Created

  • Copied some out of sync loc files into main #31871
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [wasm] Fix regression in blazor+aot #31870
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Signing: enable NuGet signature verification by default on Linux #31868
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Disambiguate GenAPI calls to base constructors #31860
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix dotnet/sdk-container-builds#414 by using three-digit version #31852
    Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #31844
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Register off-by-default analyzer: configuration binding generator #31654
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, .NET 8.0
  • Fix incorrect MicrosoftSourceLinkBitbucketGitVersion property name #31863
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Some additional prebuilt baseline cleanup #31853
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't emit `new` for explicit interface implementations #31854
    untriaged, Area-GenAPI
  • Ensure GenAPI synthesize ctors when visibility filter would otherwise omit them #31843
    untriaged, Area-GenAPI

Updated

  • Allow `dotnet sln list` to display solution folder paths #18502
    Area-CLI
  • Fix incorrect sln add generation #11846
  • Wasm SDK packed as a nuget package #31519
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Updating the minimum VS version #31720
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Prevent restore loop in VS #31798
    Area-External, untriaged
  • Disable dotnet.js fingerprinting for .NET 8 #31829
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add `-aot` parameter to the console template #31739
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add IsAotCompatible flag to enable all analyzers and IsTrimmable #31766
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
